excerpt: A creamy and delicious vegan dip that is perfect for parties and gatherings.

ingredients.name: Raw Cashews, soaked in water for at least 2 hours
Canned Artichoke Hearts
ingredients.quantity: 1 can (14 oz or 400g), drained and chopped

instructions.name: Make the Dip:
instructions: Drain the soaked cashews and add them to a blender or food processor along with the water, nutritional yeast, garlic powder, onion powder, lemon juice, and salt.
Blend on high until very smooth and creamy, scraping down the sides as needed.
Transfer the mixture to a large bowl and stir in the thawed spinach and chopped artichoke hearts.
Taste and adjust seasoning as desired.

instructions.name: Serve the Dip:
instructions: Transfer the dip to a baking dish and bake for 15-20 minutes, or until hot and bubbly.
Serve hot with toasted baguette slices, sliced carrots, and celery.
